com.airg.android.device

Class Keyboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.airg.android.device.Keyboard

  • public class Keyboard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some common soft-keyboard functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputMethodManager

        public static android.view.inputmethod.InputMethodManager getInputMethodManager(android.content.Context context)
        Get a handle to the InputMethodManager system service.
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        Returns:
        an InputMethodManager associated with the provided context

      • show

        public static void show(android.content.Context context,
                        android.view.View view)
        Show the soft keyboard. This method calls the show(Context, View, int) method with the InputMethodManager.SHOW_FORCED flag.

      • show

        public static void show(android.content.Context context,
                        android.view.View view,
                        int flags)
        Show the soft keyboard
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        view - View to attach soft keyboard to
        flags - InputMethodManager flags to use

      • hide

        public static void hide(android.content.Context context,
                        android.view.View view)
        Hide the soft keyboard. This method uses the hide(Context, View, int) with the InputMethodManager.HIDE_IMPLICIT_ONLY flag.

      • hide

        public static void hide(android.content.Context context,
                        android.view.View view,
                        int flags)
        Hide the soft keyboard
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        view - View to hide keyboard from
        flags - InputMethodManager flags to use

      • toggle

        public static void toggle(android.content.Context context,
                          android.view.View view)
        Toggle the Keyboard. This method uses the toggle(Context, View, int, int) with the InputMethodManager.SHOW_FORCED and InputMethodManager.HIDE_IMPLICIT_ONLY flags.

      • toggle

        public static void toggle(android.content.Context context,
                          android.view.View view,
                          int showFlags,
                          int hideFlags)
        Toggle the Keyboard
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        view - View on which to toggle soft keyboard
        showFlags - InputMethodManager flags to use for show
        hideFlags - InputMethodManager flags to use for hide
